      • createBookingDateList

        public void createBookingDateList()
                           throws java.lang.Exception
        Creates two lists, one containing the booked tours, another containing the dates of the bookings. Fetch all tourIDs from the table 'booking' in the datebase. If text input is exactly the same as the tourID, create a now booking object with the information store in the database. Add the booking object into bookingList, and the date to bookingDateList.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - the error is there's any

      • getBookingDateList

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getBookingDateList()
        Returns the bookingDateList if not empty or null.
        Returns:
        bookingDateList

      • setSelectedBookingText

        Sets the text input as the selectedBookingText
        Parameters:
        text - text input

      • setSelectedBooking

        public void setSelectedBooking()
        Initializes selectedBooking by checking with the text input. If selectedBookingText matches "pick 'certain date'", set the object selectedBooking from objects from bookingList which satisfies the certain date.

      • setSelectedBooking

      • filterPreference

        public java.lang.String filterPreference()
                                  throws java.lang.Exception
        Returns a tour that matches the input duration, attraction, and budget. Fetches all items in the columns 'duration', 'attraction', 'id', 'weekDayPrice', and 'weekEndPrice' from table 'tour' of the database. If there is a tour that matches the input duration, attraction and budget, add it into tourList and its ID into tourIDList and return it. Else return 'not found'
        Returns:
        the tour that matches all criteria input
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - the error if there's any

      • saveCustomerToDb

        public void saveCustomerToDb(Customer customer)
                      throws java.lang.Exception
        Adds a new customer to the database. Sets the columns of a new entry in the database according to the customer's Name ID Phone number Age ID of booked tours Number of adult-revservations Number of adult-revservations Number of toddler-reservations Total fee the customer needs to pay. Also set the tenth column to be 0.
        Parameters:
        customer - intended customer to be added into database.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • searchTourByID

        public Tour searchTourByID(java.lang.String tourId)
                    throws java.lang.Exception
        Returns the Tour with the specified tourID Fetch all ids from table 'tour' in database. If id matches with input id, fetch all other information and make a new Tour object to return.
        Parameters:
        tourId - intended tourID of returned tour
        Returns:
        tour of matching tourID with tourId
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - any error

      • searchBookingByID

        public Booking searchBookingByID(java.lang.String bookingID)
                          throws java.lang.Exception
        Returns the tour among all bookings that have the input id. Fetches all entries in booking with id bookingID. Creates a new Booking object to be returned using information from the database.
        Parameters:
        bookingID - intended bookingID
        Returns:
        tour in booking with id bookingID
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - any error
